rules_text:
Flying
[i]Good Growths[/i] – If one or more counters would be put on a permanent you control, that many plus an additional counter of that kind are put on that permanent instead.
[i]Falcoknight Extraordinaire[/i] – {3}{G}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
